product_summary: FreeSubtitles.AI is a free online tool that allows users to transcribe audio and video files into text, and translate the resulting text into multiple languages. The tool is easy to use, and supports a wide range of file formats. FreeSubtitles.AI is a great option for anyone who needs to create subtitles for videos, or transcribe audio recordings.
product_pros: Supports a wide range of file formats
Can be used to create subtitles for videos
product_cons: Limited file size and duration for free users
Transcriptions and translations may not be perfect
Can be slow to process large files
Does not offer advanced features such as speaker diarization or noise reduction

product_usecases.details: FreeSubtitles.AI can be used to create subtitles for videos in a variety of formats. This can be useful for making videos more accessible to people who are deaf or hard of hearing, or for translating videos into different languages.
FreeSubtitles.AI can be used to transcribe audio recordings into text. This can be useful for creating transcripts of meetings, lectures, or other audio content.
FreeSubtitles.AI can be used to translate text into multiple languages. This can be useful for translating documents, websites, or other text content.
FreeSubtitles.AI can be used to help people learn a new language by providing transcripts and translations of audio and video content.
FreeSubtitles.AI can be used to create educational materials such as transcripts of lectures or videos, or subtitles for educational videos.

product_toolfor.details: FreeSubtitles.AI can be used by content creators to create subtitles for videos, or to transcribe audio recordings.
FreeSubtitles.AI can be used by language learners to help them learn a new language by providing transcripts and translations of audio and video content.
FreeSubtitles.AI can be used by educators to create educational materials such as transcripts of lectures or videos, or subtitles for educational videos.
FreeSubtitles.AI can be used by researchers to transcribe audio recordings of interviews or other research data.
FreeSubtitles.AI can be used by businesses to create subtitles for videos, or to transcribe audio recordings of meetings or other business content.

product_pricing: Free to use for files up to 300MB and 1 hour in duration. Paid plans start at $0.99/hour for larger files and additional features.
